CustomField.formula:
IF ( RecordType.Name = 'Etablissement',
IMAGE("/resource/1551194700000/ICONS_ACC_Establishment", "Etablissement", 40 ,40 ) ,
IF ( RecordType.Name = 'Fournisseur',
IMAGE("/resource/1562147528000/ICONS_ACC_Fournisseurs", "Fournisseur", 60 ,60 ) ,
IF ( RecordType.Name = 'Compte désactivé',
IMAGE("/resource/1551194734000/ICONS_ACC_Closed_Establishment", "Compte désactivé", 40 ,40 ) , IF ( RecordType.Name = 'Compte Client SGL (BI Groupe)',
IMAGE("/resource/1552474352000/ICONS_ACC_SGL_Gp", "SGL Groupe", 40 ,75 ) ,
IF ( RecordType.Name = 'Compte Client SGL (BI Spé)',
IMAGE("/resource/1552474324000/ICONS_ACC_SGL_Spe", "SGL Spé", 40 ,75 ) ,
IF ( RecordType.Name = 'Groupe',
IMAGE("/resource/1551194809000/ICONS_ACC_Group", "Groupe", 40 ,40 ) , "" ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Icône du type de compte
